aff: From the Graduate School of Engineering Science and Technology, National Yunlin University of Science & Technology, Douliou, Yunlin (C-LP); Department of Emergency Medicine, Changhua Christian Medical Center, Changhua (C-WC); and Department and Graduate School of Safety and Environment Engineering, Research Center for Soil & Water Resources and Natural Disaster Prevention, National Yunlin University of Science & Technology (J-CW), Douliou, Yunlin, Taiwan, ROC.
